name: Haneru no Tobira Wii: Kirigirisu
summary: Haneru no Tobira Wii: Kirigirisu, with the aide of the program staff, you can enjoy the last minute program as it is!! In this game, which was popular at the time of airing, “How long can you jump the“ long ”jump box?”, “How many cake candles can be blown out?” Includes the last minute games such as "How much is it?" Anyone can enjoy with simple operation! Can you change the record of the performers!?
